nl.besuikerd.imageloader

Class ImageViewImageLoadingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.besuikerd.imageloader.ImageViewImageLoadingHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageLoadingHandler

    public class ImageViewImageLoadingHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageLoadingHandler
    ImageLoadingHandler used to asynchronously load Bitmaps into an ImageView
    Author:
    nicker
    See Also:
    ImageLoadingHandler

        public ImageViewImageLoadingHandler(android.content.Context context,
                            android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                            java.lang.String url,
                            int placeholderImage)
        Constructs a new ImageViewImageLoadingHandler
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        imageView - ImageView to load a Bitmap for
        url - Url to the Bitmap
        placeholderImage - id of a Placeholder image, use NO_PLACEHOLDER if you do not want one.

      • getReference

        public java.lang.Object getReference()
        Description copied from interface: ImageLoadingHandler
        This method should return an object where this handler can be referenced to. This is needed so that older tasks with the same reference get cancelled before a new asynchronous task is started.
        Specified by:
        getReference in interface ImageLoadingHandler
        Returns:
        a reference object
